      • countArticlesAmount

        long countArticlesAmount()
                  throws ServiceException
        Counts existing articles amount.
        Returns:
        long articles amount
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if input data is incorrect or DaoException exception occurred

      • findArticlesByParts

        java.util.List<Article> findArticlesByParts(long amount,
                                            long offset,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,User> authors)
                                     throws ServiceException
        Returns limited number of articles.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount of elements for select
        offset - offset in result set
        authors - empty Map to return two types from method
        Returns:
        list of articles
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if input data is incorrect or DaoException exception occurred

      • countLeftOffset

        long countLeftOffset(long lastArticle,
                     long articlesAmount)
        Calculates left offset for article's list to find articles before .
        Parameters:
        lastArticle - number of last displayed article
        articlesAmount - amount of all existing articles
        Returns:
        long left offset

      • findArticle

        Returns Article by articleId.
        Parameters:
        articleId - Id of article
        Returns:
        Optional of Article
        Throws:
